sentences.en: Alexander wore black for the rite.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大穿黑衣服参加了那个仪式.

sentences.en: Even the Big Four chains - Rite Aid , CVS, Eckerd and Walgreens - are affected.
sentences.cn: 甚至四大连锁药房——日特爱德公司, CVS, 爱克德以及沃尔格林斯 —— 也受到了影响.

sentences.en: Geography is my favo ( u ) rite subject at school.
sentences.cn: 地理是我在学校里最喜爱的课程.

sentences.en: High school wasn't always considered a near mandatory rite of passage.
sentences.cn: 高中并非一直都被认为是一种近乎强制性的通过仪式.

sentences.en: In front of the Save - Rite Store on Fifth Street.
sentences.cn: 在第5街的 Save -Rite商店前面.

sentences.en: In the south a snipe hunt is practically a rite of passage.
sentences.cn: 在南方,猎取鹬类实际上是一种成人仪式.

sentences.en: Istara : Okay. I will begin the rite of transfer.
sentences.cn: 好的. 我现在开始缔约仪式了.

sentences.en: Rite Aid is appealing the verdict 1.
sentences.cn: 日特爱德药店提出了上诉.

sentences.en: The rite is more than a transition into adulthood.
sentences.cn: 这个仪式不仅仅象征着变成成年人.

sentences.en: There is a rite, for example among my hunters.
sentences.cn: 比如说,我的那些猎人就有一种仪式.

sentences.en: These traditional rites are performed only by the women of the village.
sentences.cn: 这些传统仪式只由村里的女人来进行。

sentences.en: This festival descends from a religious rite.
sentences.cn: 这个节日起源于宗教仪式.

sentences.en: Why is the cappaciuno fastest on Myogi rite now?
sentences.cn: 为什么卡布在秒义右可以最快呢?

sentences.en: X - RITE IncorporatedX - RITE is the global leader in color science and technology.
sentences.cn: 爱色丽 公司简介:爱色丽是色彩科学和技术的全球领军企业.

sentences.en: Zuba : We will hold the rite of passage in the morning!
sentences.cn: 我们将在早晨举行成年礼!

words.tran_cn: 仪式的；例行的；礼节性的
仪式的；固守仪式的；惯例的
仪式上地；依据仪式上地
使仪式化；奉行仪式主义

phrases.tran_cn: 通过礼仪（指为人生进入一个重要阶段而举行的仪式，尤指为出生、命名、结婚、死亡而举行的仪式）；人生重大阶段的事件

trans.tran_cn: 仪式，典礼，礼仪，习惯，惯例，[宗]礼拜式
trans.tran_en: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, usually for religious purposes
